title: Electrician
description: Join our construction team in Dubai as an Electrician. Work on electrical installations and maintenance projects with comprehensive benefits including accommodation and transportation.
responsibilities: Carry out electrical installations as per drawings, including installation of supports and containment systems (e.g., conduits, trays, trunking, etc.)
Perform cabling works such as wiring, cable pulling, and terminations
Install electrical equipment and devices including distribution boards (DBs, SMDBS), breakers, isolators, wiring accessories, and light fixtures
Conduct testing and troubleshooting of electrical installations to ensure functionality and compliance
Read and interpret shop drawings accurately
Perform material take-offs based on drawings and project requirements
requirements: 2-5 years of experience in electrical installations
Ability to read and interpret electrical drawings
Knowledge of electrical codes and safety standards
Physical ability to work in construction environments
benefits: Food allowance: AED 150/month (if camp meals are not provided)
First one-way air ticket to Dubai (Upon Visa approval) will be provided by the company

title: Plumber
description: Work as a Plumber in Dubai's construction industry. Handle domestic water and drainage system installations with full company support including visa, accommodation, and transportation.
responsibilities: Carry out domestic water and drainage system installations as per approved drawings
Install support systems and various piping types, including PPR, HDPE, PEX, Copper, GRP, uPVC, etc., for water supply, soil, waste, condensate drain, and vent systems
Perform pipe welding, brazing, and jointing as required for different materials
Install plumbing fixtures and equipment, including sanitary ware, floor drains, water heaters, and related accessories
Ensure proper alignment, slope, and connection integrity of all installed piping systems
Adhere to local plumbing codes, safety standards, and project specifications
requirements: 2-5 years of experience in plumbing installations
Knowledge of various piping materials and installation techniques
Ability to read plumbing drawings and specifications
Understanding of local plumbing codes and safety standards
benefits: Food allowance: AED 150/month (if camp meals are not provided)
First one-way air ticket to Dubai (Upon Visa approval) will be provided by the company

title: Helper
description: Start your career in Dubai's construction industry as a Helper. Assist skilled workers and gain valuable experience with comprehensive company benefits including accommodation and transportation.
responsibilities: Assist skilled workers such as electricians and plumbers
Load and unload materials and tools
Perform basic tasks at construction or maintenance sites
Maintain cleanliness and safety of the work area
Follow instructions from supervisors and skilled tradesmen
requirements: Physical fitness and ability to perform manual labor
Willingness to learn and follow instructions
Basic understanding of construction safety practices
Ability to work in a team environment
No specific experience required - entry level position
benefits: Food allowance: AED 150/month (if camp meals are not provided)
First one-way air ticket to Dubai (Upon Visa approval) will be provided by the company
